page.title: 20Pleasurewood Hills
page.content: Pleasurewood Hills is a big commercial Amusement Park situated beetween Corton and Lowestoft.Opened in 1982,it was designed like an American Theme Park and aimed at Family entertainment. There are over thirty rides including Miniature Railways,Boating Lakes,a Carousel,Space-Rotar,Sky-Leap,Astro- Glide,B.M.X Track,Fairy Land Train, Turbo-Star,Cinema 180.The most popular is the Pirate Ship.Once you have paid your entrance fee then everything inside is free.There are Barbecues, Restaurants and Cafeterias for eating in or out.7,000 people a-day visit the Park in the season.Over 100 people are enployed there.
